mapper.update: update instance set insindex = #{insindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, insstatus = #{insstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inscomptime = #{inscomptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, documentid = #{documentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, labelid = #{labelid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where insid = #{insid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select insid, insindex, insstatus, inscomptime, documentid, labelid from instance
